title: Font found on Instagram
content:
Could someone please help identify this font? I found this on Instagram and one of the comments said that the Hudson Bay Company seems to be using it for way-finding signage. Googled it but couldn't find anything.

Please help.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [image.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823025706/http:/typophile.com/files/image_69.jpg) | 109.95 KB |
author: typeluv

comments.content: Wow! That was quick. Thanks a ton Ryuk.
